hint: Apply safe, proven optimizations by pushing filters early into CTEs, pre-filtering dimension tables, and reducing join cardinality before aggregation.
Isolate selective date and dimension filters into explicit CTEs, then join with the fact table to minimize intermediate data movement.
Pre-filter and materialize ALL dimension and fact tables in separate CTEs, then restructure joins to eliminate duplicate scans and leverage prefetching.
Break complex join patterns via decomposition (fact table self-joins), decorrelate filters, and use materialized pre-filtering for radical plan changes.
